name: Dawn of the Angel
description:
In Dawn of the Angel you take the role of Amaru, an angel who has been sealed for a long time. Now she can transform into a darkest version, this should be useful to scape from the ruins. 

Fight three diferent bosses using your own skill, face against the curses and become a true angel. 

--------------------------------------

Install Instructions

1. Download file

2. Decompress file

3. Open executable
